Text:
thanks a lot... many more like this please....

ps: is it possible to compress these any more ? 300mb seems very large for 18 books ?

You are quite right I could have processed them in an OCR app. like FineReader, but considering the work with scanning and post production in Photoshop, I found it reasonable to upload the bitmaps.
Besides, there is a risk of errors with OCR.
I hardly download this torrent. Can someone can re-seed the torrent for me. Thank You
Thank you very much for making this available, I've been looking for the MacQuarrie translation for a while now ;)
